hibernate-mapping.query: from Estoque as est where (:dataInicial is null or est.data >= :dataInicial) and (:dataFinal is null or est.data <= :dataFinal) and (:status is null or est.status = :status) and ( (:nome1 is null or est.produto.nome like :nome1) or (:nome2 is null or est.produto.nome like :nome2) ) order by est.produto.nome

from Estoque as est where (:dataInicial is null or est.data >= :dataInicial) and (:dataFinal is null or est.data <= :dataFinal) and (:vendedor is null or est.vendedor = :vendedor) ) order by est.produto.nome

select sum(est.valor) from Estoque as est where (:dataInicial is not null or :dataFinal is not null or :vendedor is not null) and (:dataInicial is null or est.data >= :dataInicial) and (:dataFinal is null or est.data <= :dataFinal) and (:vendedor is null or est.vendedor = :vendedor)

select sum(est.valor) from Estoque as est where (:dataInicial is not null or :dataFinal is not null) and (:dataInicial is null or est.data >= :dataInicial) and (:dataFinal is null or est.data <= :dataFinal)
